transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Haan ji bolo.
Executive: Hello Jai Maa Bhavani Headberg offset machine se baat ho rahi hai?
Customer: Haan ji bataiye.
Executive: Sir main Riya bol rahi hu IndiaMART head office se.
Customer: Hmm hmm boliye.
Executive: Gopal Krishna ji se baat ho rahi hai meri?
Customer: Main idhar baat kar raha hu Ashna hu main.
Executive: Sir actually unhone ek concern raise kiya tha to uske hi regarding baat karni thi mujhe to aap update kar payenge ya actually ha ji unhone ha unhone bola tha ki buyleads pe unhe issue aa raha hai kuch buyleads pe jaise aaj unhone ek buylead purchase ki to unke according buyer ki requirement nahi thi to wo bol rahe hain ki ha ji to wo bol rahe hain ki aap jo hai sari cheeze check kariye aur aisa to maine unko waha pe bhi baat boli ki har buyer ka mind nahi check kiya ja sakta hai ki wo uski genuine kya aapki wo kya likhi hui hai kahin information ya jo bhi aapko padhate hain.
Customer: Kyunki har ek wo jo hum jab bhi issue raise karte hain yahi cheez bolte hain wo log.
Executive: Hame pata hai already wo batane ki to jarurat hai nahi.
Customer: Sir ye cheez to hoti hi hai na.
Executive: Haan to hum bol rahe hain na hum kaha mana kar rahe hain.
Customer: But samne wala response yahi de raha hai ki nahi bilkul requirement hi nahi hai to baat hi khatam ho jati hai na sab cheeze.
Executive: Aap kitni der ke baad unhe connect kar rahe hain aapke pehle fresh lete hain to bhi hota hai aisa jyadatar.
Customer: Fresh aap lead dekho na uske baad bhi jo unhone bataya na uske baad bhi ek lead uthai humne.
Customer: Haan uthai hui hai ek lead aapne aaj teen ki hui hai.
Customer: Haan to third wala bhi yahi tha.
Executive: Third wala bhi aur call record unke phone mein hai main bata main bata dunga wo kya keh raha tha wo person.
Customer: Usne bola main bas check kar raha tha bar bar call karke pareshan mat kariye.
Executive: Kitni der pehle ki lead aapne consume ki thi wo ek ghante do ghante kitni der pehle ki thi?
Customer: Haan fresh hi thi wo wali to sir.
Executive: Sir fresh ka bhi kuch time hoga na.
Customer: 31 minutes thi I guess pata nahi.
Customer: Par tak nahi pata unke phone mein se.
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm.
Customer: Main aapko ha main aapko ek cheez ye bhi bata deti hu ki kuch jo leads hoti hai na wo agar aap der mein connect karte hain to ek buylead pe total panch log baat karte hain.
Executive: To kabhi kabhi buyer fed up hota hai wo us wo ab koi bhi buyer ye to nahi batayega ki main kahin aur se le chuka hu ya mujhe koi better deal mil gayi hai wo ye bolta hai na aapke liye hota kya hai offset hai ye normal printer nahi hai.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: To isme kya hai achanak se insan purchase nahi mar deta hai jaise agar aap phone lene jaoge to aap dekh loge aur le loge but iski deal on table pe hoti hai theek hai call pe to isme possible hai nahi itna.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: To aisa koi response dega hi nahi pehli baat to aur ye pichli bar bhi maine koi alag se uh uleksha karke thi hamare mein wo jo maine Gulaksha Gulaksha ha.
Customer: Hmm hmm hmm.
Customer: Usko bhi batayi thi ki hamari machineo ki jo deal hoti hai wo direct nahi hoti aise aur panch buyer agar ek lead ko le rahe hain to wo buyer pancho se dekhega jisko kaha best mil raha hai wo ye response nahi dega ki mere ko nahi chahiye.
Customer: Kyunki ye koi item nahi hai ye matlab deal ke liye isme baithna hi padta hai baat cheet karke hi wo karna padta hai direct deal nahi hoti isme.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Heavy duty machine aati hai na ye normal printer nahi hai 50 60 kilo ka jo aisa hai.
Executive: To hame apna issue resolve karana hai aur kuch nahi.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Kyunki ab tum wo pehle bol rahe the ki catalog wala utha rahe ho ye wo jo aapne pichli bar kisi ne bola tha to catalog wale uske baad to humne uthaye bhi nahi lead.
Executive: Hmm.
Executive: Same issue aa raha hai fir bhi.
Customer: Catalog wali catalog matlab views wali jo customer aapki wo pichli bar ye bola tha ki wo mat uthaya kariye wo to log view karte to wo humne chhod diya uthana.
Executive: Theek hai.
Executive: To ye to normal buylead hai isme bhi yahi aa raha hai jo verified aap log bolte ho to kya verification hai.
Customer: Sir dekhiye main bata deti hu jaise aap ye offset ka bol rahe hain yaha pe ki aapka product line aisa hai ki buyer sabse price puchega fir ek deal karega hai na.
Executive: But exact buyer ka mindset sach mein wo kya chah raha hai ye aap kaise ek call pe judge kar sakte hain ye bhi to nahi possible na aap kar sakte hain na hum kar sakte hain na hamari team kar sakti hai ye to koi bhi nahi kar sakta na.
Customer: Aap verify kaise karte ho ye batao mere ko pehle.
Executive: Main bata jaise aapka ye mini offset printing machine hai na ab iski IndiaMART pe ab tak 87 inquiry aayi hui hai theek hai ab is 87 mein se agar main aapke paas dekh leti hu ki mini offset mein se aapke paas abhi kitni aayi hai isme se eight aapke paas aayi hai inquiry theek hai total eight aapne consume ki hui hai.
Executive: To jo verify to leads aise hi hoti hai na sir customer ne apni requirement dali wo post hui ab us pe jo bhi call karega wo baat karega.
Customer: Dali kaha se customer ne apni requirement?
Executive: Google se.
Customer: Google se to jo type karte hain wo to catalog view mein jata hai na.
Executive: Nahi sir dono hota hai catalog views aur buylead to aapko wo ab option change hua hai na aapko buylead pe hi wo option dikhta hai ki this might be a catalog view to wo jo customer aapko agar last call ka bhi jo response jo aapko check karna hai na to aapko dikhna hoga na last humne jo uthai thi lead jo complaint ke baad bhi uthai thi jo us pe bhi ek bar call karke dekhiye wo kya bolta hai aapko.
Customer: Call to hum nahi kar sakte yaha pe bas hame teen lead aaj ki purchase ki hui dikh rahi hai Ravindra Saran ek Hari aur ek Neelak Lochan ye teen ha to wala jo hai na wo uska to response aisa hi tha uska bhi.
Executive: Sir aisa par nahi hota hai na hamare end pe ab agar koi google pe inquiry dal raha hai to ab wo specifically to aapko nahi dal raha hai agar buylead aati hai aap buylead pe baat kare to buylead wo in general kar raha hai lekin jo inquiry aap lead manager pe inquiry direct ka filter laga ke check karenge ya calls pe agar aisa aata hai to wo specific aapko aa rahi hai right lekin jo buylead hoti hai wo customer in general requirement post kar raha hai to usko koi bhi call karega total to panch hi karenge but usme bhi wahi hota hai na initial five customer bhi call kar pate hain.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hmm boliye.
Executive: Sir aapko thoda yaha pe ye cheez samajhni padegi buyer ka mindset hum kya koi bhi nahi check kar payega ki wo uski requirement genuine hai aur uske baad bhi maine sir ko bola aap boliye ab resolve kya hoga isme ye mere ko bataiye mere ko kuch nahi sunna ab.
Customer: Sir aapke solution kya hai?
Customer: Sir iska iska solution ye dekhiye pehle bhi aisa ab jo hai buylead ka number aapka badh gaya right pehle to itni buylead ke number provide bhi nahi hote the ab aapko ek week mein 44 buyleads mil rahi hai to ye cheez 44 44 30 weekly aur do daily bonus.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Sir 30 hafte ki milti hai aur do daily ki ho gayi to total jo do do mil rahi hai wo bhi 14 ho gayi saat din mein to 30 plus 14 is equals to 44 right.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hmm boliye.
Executive: Haan ji to ye 44 leads mil gayi isliye to number itna jyada hai na sir ki aapko kuch aisi inquiry bhi hongi jaha pe customer bolega aapko wo ki bas main visit kar raha tha main check kar raha tha meri koi requirement nahi hai 100% accuracy offline bhi aapke koi shop par ya aapki man lijiye industry specific shop shop hai ho sakta hai aisa hota hai but ratio to hota hai na aaj ka ratio dekh lo 100% hai aaj ka to.
Customer: Main samajh rahi hu aaj ka aisa hua but ye hamesha ka to nahi hoga na.
Executive: Hamesha yahi hota hai hum to complaint jab raise karte hain jab dimag kharab ho jaye ekdam subah subah.
Executive: Hum kyu approach karenge ye bataiye mindset to hum bhi samajh rahe hain hame bhi pata chal raha hai business kar rahe hain itne time se to har type ka to nahi aata consumer.
Customer: Bilkul.
Executive: Issue issue kab raise hoga jab problem hogi tabhi to hoga psychology samajhne ke liye issue raise karega koi.
Customer: Nahi nahi wo main aapki baat samajh rahi hu sir ki issue hai tabhi aapne bola but wo wala jo ye buyleads pe customer ye bol raha maine sir ko bola ki GST verified to sir ne kaha ki hamare GST verified aap dekhiye total lead dekhiye kitna bol rahe hain aaj mini offset ki 85 87 na agar hum GST verified lene jayenge to humko do lead milenge fir kya hai hamara.
Executive: Lead GST verified thodi na hoti hai.
Executive: Is is is hisab se to hum lead hi na uthaye fir.
Customer: Kyu nahi hai sir aap filter to lagaiye dikh to rahi hai kafi lekin sir ne mujhe bola ki hamari industry mein GST aur non GST se matlab nahi hai to sab jagah hi hota hai jaruri thodi na GST holder hi purchase marta hai wo naya kam chalu karta hai to koi bhi koi offset lagata hai to naya kam chalu karne ke liye lagata hai jyada.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Sir dekhiye buylead wala jo hai wo yahi hi hoga ki aap new features bhi aaye like fast leads wali bhi aayi hai aap unko bhi interested mark kar sakte hain aur jo ye wali issue hai ki buyer bol raha hai requirement nahi hai to is pe jo hai nahi to wo ho pata hai kyunki maine bhi baat ki hai ha ji.
Executive: Buyer ka requirement buyer ka issue buyer ka mindset koi nahi check kar payega na.
Executive: Abhi main bhi apni inquiry dal du aur fir mujhe call karke koi call kare aur fir bole ki aapki requirement thi main abhi bol dungi nahi to wo cheez bhi to depend karti hai na buyer ka mind koi nahi check kar sakta sir hum agar verify bhi kara lenge to bhi man lijiye hamare verification pe wo bole ki ha theek hai fir usko teen char panch call aayenge to wo bole meri koi requirement hi nahi thi to fir us pe buyer agar denial mode mein hai to fir koi kuch nahi kar payega na.
Executive: Hmm.
Executive: Aap calls aur inquiries bhi to dekhiye sirf isliye to hum sirf buyleads pe to provide nahi kar rahe aapko ki aapko sirf business buyleads se milega aapko direct calls bhi aati hai aapko direct inquiries bhi aati hai aapki profile ki listing bhi aapki profile ke ratings bhi hai wo bhi matlab uska bhi number kam hi hai 3.5 out of five ki hai sirf 19 logo ne di hai kuch cheeze ye bhi aur agar main aapke recently rate check karti hu aap bahut delay lead consume karte hain aapka zero to four hour mein jo consumption hai yani recent leads ka jo do ghante teen ghante se kam ki hoti hai wo aapka 20% aap konsa aap dekho na ab hamare business mein dekhna konsi fresh lead aati hai har ek second pe to lead aati hi nahi hai jaise har ek minute pe lead aa gayi ek to consume kar le hum.
Executive: Aur aapki lead aati hai jyadatar to kya raat ko to customer ko call nahi kar sakte jo business hour hai usme hi karenge.
Executive: Ab subah main dekh raha tha ki 12 ghante pehle ki lead to 12 ghante matlab ek raat ke 1 baje to raat ke 1 baje to kisi ko call nahi kar sakte hum.
Customer: Aap recent pe jab aap recent pe click karte hain tab aapko abhi mujhe ek ghante do ghante do lead milegi do teen lead milegi mere ko recent pe relevant pe hi mere ko jana padta hai recent mein aisa to hai nahi jaise din ki aa rahi ho hazaro lead aa rahi ho recent mein.
Executive: Lead to itni nahi rehti na.
Customer: To aap aapka bhi to product line mein matlab us hisab se requirement aapko bhi to pata hoga na online offline kitna hai product line specific hai to demand hi jitni hogi utni hi to inquiry aayengi na.
Executive: Ye cheez bhi to hai na aur fir uske alawa recent se uthaya karo to matlab ha hmm hmm.
Executive: Din ki kitni lead aati hai aap hi dekho recent mein.
Customer: Haan sir main bilkul dekh rahi hu hai agar aap system pe abhi to bataiye main meeting link online baith ke usko dekh lete hain I guess already shared hi hai mera meeting link aapke sath aapki jo official wali us pe bhi koi issue nahi hai main aapko us pe bhi share kal kal dekhiyega kal kal main apne laptop mein chalu karke aapko tabhi dikha dunga.
Customer: Kal kitne baje main call kar lu aapko aap batao.
Executive: Kal kitne baje dopahar mein kar lo dopahar mein theek hai.
Customer: Dopahar mein kar lo dopahar matlab 12 baje 12:30 ke around kar lu.
Executive: Haan aapka nahi to main aapke whatsapp pe likh dunga message kar dunga.
Customer: Whatsapp pe likh denge matlab sir?
Executive: Main aapko message kar dunga jab jab bhi acha acha acha acha to fir bataiye tab tak main aapka ye concern close kar du jo aapne ye open kiya hua hai apna.
Customer: Tab tak means?
Executive: Main bol rahi hu ki jab kal hum is pe discussion karenge to abhi main aapka ye jo ticket open aapne kiya hai customer care pe call kiya hai wo main close kar du agar aapki permission ho to.
Customer: Nahi nahi rehne do main bar bar thodi na raise karunga us pe kal hum baat kar lenge.
Executive: Kal baat karenge abhi nahi possible ho payega sir?
Customer: Nahi abhi possible nahi ho payega.
Executive: To fir main ek kam karti hu main aapko abhi apne whatsapp number se bhi hello karti hu aur main kal aapko 12 12:30 ke around call karungi fir humko online baith ke discuss karte hain theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai sir.
Customer: Theek hai okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer facing issues with buyleads.

- Buyer says no requirement after lead purchase.

- Wants resolution for the issue.



Resolution:

- Explained about the number of buyleads provided.

- Explained about the buyer's mindset.

- Executive will call back to discuss the issue.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back at 12:00-12:30 PM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, resolution, verification
